actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the importation of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat for a 6-month period.

summary.text: Prohibits the importation, and the withdrawal from warehouse for consumption, of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat into the United States for a six-month period. Authorizes an exemption under this Act for specified cases in order to prevent loss due to spoilage.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the importation of fresh, chilled, or frozen cattle meat for a 6-month period.
